name: Trunklug

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.desc: The possessor is oblivious, and that keeps it from being infatuated or falling for taunts.

abilities.name: Herbivorous (Secret)
abilities.desc: Increase the possessor's Attack stat by 1 stage when hit by a Nature-type move.

description: Trunklug are gentle Pokémon who love to soak themselves in the grass and enjoy a cool chilling wind on the plains. They are well-known for growing a small tree on their back and decorate it over the year. Many other smaller Pokémon also love to reside under that small tree.
